segments.text: I see a girl standing near the boy, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, with her arm raised and palm open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's aware of the danger her brother is in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be cooperating with him, not touching the stool but clearly wanting a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her posture is attentive and expectant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn't encourage him to take more risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks like she's having fun, but she needs to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy struggling to balance on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should tell an adult about what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they both will get in trouble for taking cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, still unaware of the children's actions.
segments.speaker: PAR
